snippet: A parole board panel recommended parole Thursday for a Charles Manson follower, Bruce Davis, who has been imprisoned for 40 years.
abstract: California parole board panel recommends parole for Bruce Davis, a Charles Manson follower who was convicted for murder and has been imprisoned for 40 years.
lead_paragraph: A parole board panel recommended parole Thursday for a Charles Manson follower, Bruce Davis, who has been imprisoned for 40 years.

headline.seo: California: Manson Follower Bruce Davis Has Chance of Parole
headline.main: California: Manson Follower Has Chance of Parole
headline.print_headline: California: Manson Follower Has Chance of Parole
